name: SOUL-SURVIVOR
description:
Also Available on OperaGX (GXC.GG) - Play on OperaGX For Best Experience.

SOUL-SURVIVOR

GOOD LUCK, YOU'LL NEED IT.

SOUL-SURVIVOR is a Bullet-Hell style game focused on the Rage Game Genre. It works like this.

To start, simply press the SPACE key on the title screen. In game, you have four control keys. UP, DOWN, LEFT and RIGHT. control them using the ARROW KEYS on your keyboard.

There are 3 main mechanics in SOUL-SURVIVOR. The Bullets, The Lasers, and the Difficulty.

BULLETS:
  • At all times, there will be bullets flying across the screen.
  • Bullets will travel horizontally, limiting vertical movement.
  • Bullets come from both sides of the screen.
  • Bullets speed up the farther they've gone across the screen.
LASERS:
  • At all times there will be a single laser on screen.
  • Lasers take 1 second to charge upon game start, symbolized by the fading in.
  • Lasers span the entire distance from the top to the bottom of the screen
  • The Particles that appear after a laser has spawned are safe to touch, and so is the chargeup.
DIFFICULTY:
  • The longer you play, the higher the Difficulty Score becomes
  • Bullets become faster when the difficulty score is higher
  • Laser Chargeup animations are faster when the difficulty score is higher

I hope you enjoy!
